messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Supermatter Engine.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a whoop of wire eating mammals have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
